name: Youtubers Life
description: Become the most successful youtuber on the planet! Create videos, get subscribers, attend events, interact with your fans… and grow your channel. Live a youtuber’s life!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM (NVIDIA GeForce) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: Better played at 16:9 resolutions. Check your quality settings in the game if you experience performance problems.
